144inline const QwtSeriesData< QwtPointPolar >* QwtPolarCurve::data() const
145{
146 return m_series;
147}
148
153inline QwtPointPolar QwtPolarCurve::sample( int i ) const
154{
155 return m_series->sample( i );
156}
